Flow is as follows:       - Tranche is funded in MTA by the 'Governor'       - Participants use the mint functions to mint mUSD       - Mint quantity is logged to the specified rewardee in the current tranche       - Tranche period ends, and participants have 8 weeks in which to claim their reward          - Reward allocation is calculated proportionately as f(mintVolume, totalMintVolume, trancheFunding)          - Unclaimed rewards can be retrieved by 'Governor' for future tranches       - Reward allocation is unlocked for redemption after 52 weeks","methods":{"approveAllBassets()":{"details":"Approve max tokens for mUSD contract for each bAsset"},"approveFor(address)":{"details":"Approve max tokens for mUSD contact of a given bAsset token contract","params":{"_bAsset":"bAsset token address"}},"changeGovernor(address)":{"details":"Rewards governor can choose another governor to fund the tranches "},"claimReward(uint256)":{"details":"Allows a rewardee to claim their reward allocation. This must be     called after the tranche period has ended, and before the claim period has elapsed.","params":{"_trancheNumber":"Number of the tranche to attempt to claim"},"return":"claimed          Bool result of claim"},"claimReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Allows a rewardee to claim their reward allocation. Reward allocation is calculated     proportionately as f(mintVolume, totalMintVolume, trancheFunding). This must be     called after the tranche period has ended, and before the claim period has elapsed.","params":{"_rewardee":"Address for which the reward should be claimed","_trancheNumber":"Number of the tranche to attempt to claim"},"return":"claimed          Bool result of claim"},"fundTranche(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Governor funds the tranche with MTA by sending it to the contract.     Funding times                 Behaviour     Before tranche 'endTime'      Able to add or top up rewards     Between 'endTime' and         Only able to add if current funding == 0             'claimEndTime'     After 'claimEndTime'          No funding allowed","params":{"_fundQuantity":"Amount of MTA to allocate to the tranche","_trancheNumber":"Tranche number to fund (starting at 0)"}},"getRewardeeData(uint256,address)":{"details":"Get data for a particular rewardee at a particular tranche","params":{"_rewardee":"Address of the rewardee","_trancheNumber":"ID of the tranche"},"return":"mintWindowClosed     Time at which window closedclaimWindowClosed    Time at which claim window closedunlocked             Time the rewards unlockedmintVolume           Rewardee mint volume in trancheclaimed              Bool to signify that the rewardee has claimedrewardAllocation     Units of MTA claimed by the rewardeeredeemed             Bool - has the rewardee withdrawn their reward"},"getRewardeeData(uint256[],address)":{"details":"Get rewardee data over an array of tranches","params":{"_rewardee":"Rewardee address","_trancheNumbers":"ID's for all tranches to retrieve"},"return":"mintWindowClosed     Arr Tranche minting window closedclaimWindowClosed    Arr Time the claim window closedunlocked             Arr Unlock time for tranchemintVolume           Arr Rewardees mint volumeclaimed              Arr Rewardee claim boolrewardAllocation     Arr Rewardee allocated units of MTAredeemed             Arr Redeemed"},"getRewardeesData(uint256,address[])":{"details":"Get array of rewardees data in a particular tranche","params":{"_rewardees":"Array of rewardee addresses","_trancheNumber":"ID of the tranche"},"return":"mintVolume           Arr Rewardee mint volumeclaimed              Arr Rewardee claimedrewardAllocation     Arr Rewardee allocationredeemed             Arr Rewardee redeemed"},"getTrancheData(uint256)":{"details":"Basic getter to retrieve all relevant data from the tranche struct and dates","params":{"_trancheNumber":"Tranche ID for which to retrieve data"},"return":"startTime              Time the Tranche opened for MintingendTime                Time the Tranche minting window closedclaimEndTime           Time the Tranche claim window closedunlockTime             Time the rewards for this Tranche unlockedtotalMintVolume        Total minting volume occurred during TranchetotalRewardUnits       Total units of funding provided by governanceunclaimedRewardUnits   Total units of funding remaining unclaimedrewardees              Array of reward participants"},"mintSingleTo(address,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Mint mUSD to a specified recipient and then log the minted quantity to rewardee.     bAsset used in the mint must be first transferred here from msg.sender, before     being approved for spending by the mUSD contract","params":{"_basset":"bAsset address that will be used as minting collateral","_bassetQuantity":"Quantity of the above basset","_massetRecipient":"Address to which the newly minted mUSD will be sent","_rewardRecipient":"Address to which the rewards will be attributed"},"return":"massetMinted       Units of mUSD that were minted"},"mintTo(uint32,uint256[],address,address)":{"details":"Mint mUSD to a specified recipient and then log the minted quantity to rewardee.     bAssets used in the mint must be first transferred here from msg.sender, before     being approved for spending by the mUSD contract","params":{"_bassetQuantities":"bAsset quantities that will be used during the mint (ordered as per Basket composition)","_massetRecipient":"Address to which the newly minted mUSD will be sent","_rewardRecipient":"Address to which the rewards will be attributed"},"return":"massetMinted       Units of mUSD that were minted"},"redeemReward(uint256)":{"details":"Redemption of the previously claimed reward. Must be called after the lockup     period has elapsed. Only withdraws if the rewardee has > 0 allocated.","params":{"_trancheNumber":"Number of the tranche to attempt to redeem"},"return":"redeemed         Bool to signal the successful redemption"},"redeemReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Redemption of the previously claimed reward. Must be called after the lockup     period has elapsed. Only withdraws if the rewardee has > 0 allocated.","params":{"_rewardee":"Rewardee for whom the redemption should be processed","_trancheNumber":"Number of the tranche to attempt to redeem"},"return":"redeemed         Bool to signal the successfull redemption"},"withdrawUnclaimedRewards(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the governor to withdraw any MTA that has not been claimed","params":{"_trancheNumber":"ID of the tranche for which to claim back nodes.documentation:
@title ForgeRewardsMUSD
@dev Forge wrapper that rewards minters for their contribution to mUSD liquidity.
     Flow is as follows:
       - Tranche is funded in MTA by the 'Governor'
       - Participants use the mint functions to mint mUSD
       - Mint quantity is logged to the specified rewardee in the current tranche
       - Tranche period ends, and participants have 8 weeks in which to claim their reward
          - Reward allocation is calculated proportionately as f(mintVolume, totalMintVolume, trancheFunding)
          - Unclaimed rewards can be retrieved by 'Governor' for future tranches
       - Reward allocation is unlocked for redemption after 52 weeks
nodes.name: ForgeRewardsMUSD

devdoc.details: Forge wrapper that rewards minters for their contribution to mUSD liquidity.     Flow is as follows:       - Tranche is funded in MTA by the 'Governor'       - Participants use the mint functions to mint mUSD       - Mint quantity is logged to the specified rewardee in the current tranche       - Tranche period ends, and participants have 8 weeks in which to claim their reward          - Reward allocation is calculated proportionately as f(mintVolume, totalMintVolume, trancheFunding)          - Unclaimed rewards can be retrieved by 'Governor' for future tranches       - Reward allocation is unlocked for redemption after 52 weeks

approveAllBassets().details: Approve max tokens for mUSD contract for each bAsset

approveFor(address).details: Approve max tokens for mUSD contact of a given bAsset token contract

changeGovernor(address).details: Rewards governor can choose another governor to fund the tranches

claimReward(uint256).details: Allows a rewardee to claim their reward allocation. Reward allocation is calculated     proportionately as f(mintVolume, totalMintVolume, trancheFunding). This must be     called after the tranche period has ended, and before the claim period has elapsed.

params._trancheNumber: Number of the tranche to attempt to claim

claimReward(uint256,address).details: Allows a rewardee to claim their reward allocation. Reward allocation is calculated     proportionately as f(mintVolume, totalMintVolume, trancheFunding). This must be     called after the tranche period has ended, and before the claim period has elapsed.

params._rewardee: Address for which the reward should be claimed
params._trancheNumber: Number of the tranche to attempt to claim

fundTranche(uint256,uint256).details: Governor funds the tranche with MTA by sending it to the contract.     Funding times                 Behaviour     Before tranche 'endTime'      Able to add or top up rewards     Between 'endTime' and         Only able to add if current funding == 0             'claimEndTime'     After 'claimEndTime'          No funding allowed

params._fundQuantity: Amount of MTA to allocate to the tranche

getRewardeeData(uint256,address).details: Get data for a particular rewardee at a particular tranche
getRewardeeData(uint256,address).return: mintWindowClosed     Time at which window closedclaimWindowClosed    Time at which claim window closedunlocked             Time the rewards unlockedmintVolume           Rewardee mint volume in trancheclaimed              Bool to signify that the rewardee has claimedrewardAllocation     Units of MTA claimed by the rewardeeredeemed             Bool - has the rewardee withdrawn their reward

getRewardeeData(uint256[],address).details: Get rewardee data over an array of tranches

params._trancheNumbers: ID's for all tranches to retrieve

getRewardeeData(uint256[],address).return: mintWindowClosed     Arr Tranche minting window closedclaimWindowClosed    Arr Time the claim window closedunlocked             Arr Unlock time for tranchemintVolume           Arr Rewardees mint volumeclaimed              Arr Rewardee claim boolrewardAllocation     Arr Rewardee allocated units of MTAredeemed             Arr Redeemed

getRewardeesData(uint256,address[]).details: Get array of rewardees data in a particular tranche
getRewardeesData(uint256,address[]).return: mintVolume           Arr Rewardee mint volumeclaimed              Arr Rewardee claimedrewardAllocation     Arr Rewardee allocationredeemed             Arr Rewardee redeemed

getTrancheData(uint256).details: Basic getter to retrieve all relevant data from the tranche struct and dates

params._trancheNumber: Tranche ID for which to retrieve data

getTrancheData(uint256).return: startTime              Time the Tranche opened for MintingendTime                Time the Tranche minting window closedclaimEndTime           Time the Tranche claim window closedunlockTime             Time the rewards for this Tranche unlockedtotalMintVolume        Total minting volume occurred during TranchetotalRewardUnits       Total units of funding provided by governanceunclaimedRewardUnits   Total units of funding remaining unclaimedrewardees              Array of reward participants

mintSingleTo(address,uint256,address,add.details: Mint mUSD to a specified recipient and then log the minted quantity to rewardee.     bAsset used in the mint must be first transferred here from msg.sender, before     being approved for spending by the mUSD contract

params._basset: bAsset address that will be used as minting collateral
params._massetRecipient: Address to which the newly minted mUSD will be sent
params._rewardRecipient: Address to which the rewards will be attributed

mintSingleTo(address,uint256,address,add.return: massetMinted       Units of mUSD that were minted

mintTo(uint32,uint256[],address,address).details: Mint mUSD to a specified recipient and then log the minted quantity to rewardee.     bAssets used in the mint must be first transferred here from msg.sender, before     being approved for spending by the mUSD contract

params._bassetQuantities: bAsset quantities that will be used during the mint (ordered as per Basket composition)
params._massetRecipient: Address to which the newly minted mUSD will be sent
params._rewardRecipient: Address to which the rewards will be attributed

mintTo(uint32,uint256[],address,address).return: massetMinted       Units of mUSD that were minted

redeemReward(uint256).details: Redemption of the previously claimed reward. Must be called after the lockup     period has elapsed. Only withdraws if the rewardee has > 0 allocated.

params._trancheNumber: Number of the tranche to attempt to redeem

redeemReward(uint256).return: redeemed         Bool to signal the successful redemption

redeemReward(uint256,address).details: Redemption of the previously claimed reward. Must be called after the lockup     period has elapsed. Only withdraws if the rewardee has > 0 allocated.

params._rewardee: Rewardee for whom the redemption should be processed
params._trancheNumber: Number of the tranche to attempt to redeem

redeemReward(uint256,address).return: redeemed         Bool to signal the successfull redemption

withdrawUnclaimedRewards(uint256).details: Allows the governor to withdraw any MTA that has not been claimed

params._trancheNumber: ID of the tranche for which to claim back MTA
